title: Glenn Gould Jacket Collection organized by composer FLAC
description:
FLAC+CUE

I've organized the folder structure according to composer, with CD numbers as part of the folder names.

This is arguably the greatest collection of classical recordings of all time - don't miss out. 



Track list by CD number:


01  Bach: The Goldberg Variations: 4.5 

02  Sonata No. 30 in E Major, Op. 109 / Sonata No. 31 in A-Flat Major, Op. 110 / Sonata No. 32 in c Minor, Op. 111 [Glenn Gould]: 3.5
